mn29:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
mn29:1.3: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn29:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.4: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:2.7: ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.8: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:2.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.10: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:2.11: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:2.12: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ atikkamma papaṭikaṁ, sākhāpalāsaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:2.13: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:2.14: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:2.15: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:2.16: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:2.17: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:2.18: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:2.19: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti ‘ahamasmi lābhasakkārasilokavā, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn29:2.20: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:2.21: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sākhāpalāsaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:3.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:3.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:3.4: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:3.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:3.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:3.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:3.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:3.11: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:3.12: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:3.13: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:3.14: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:3.15: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:3.16: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ atikkamma tacaṁ, papaṭikaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno;
mn29:3.17: yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:4.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.4: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:4.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.11: ‘ahamasmi sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā’ti.
mn29:4.12: So tāya sīlasampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:4.13: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu papaṭikaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:4.15: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.16: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.17: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.18: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.19: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.20: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.21: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:4.22: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.23: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.24: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:4.26: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.27: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.28: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.29: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:4.30: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ tacaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:4.31: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ, na aññāsi phegguṁ, na aññāsi tacaṁ, na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:4.32: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ atikkamma phegguṁ tacaṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:4.33: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:4.34: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:4.35: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:4.36: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:4.37: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:4.38: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.39: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.40: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:4.41: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.42: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:4.43: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:4.44: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:4.45: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.46: ‘ahamasmi samāhito ekaggacitto, ime panaññe bhikkhū asamāhitā vibbhantacittā’ti.
mn29:4.47: So tāya samādhisampadāya majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:4.48: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tacaṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:5.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:5.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:5.4: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:5.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati.
mn29:5.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.11: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.13: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.14: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.16: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:5.18: Ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṁ apassaṁ viharantī’ti.
mn29:5.19: So tena ñāṇadassanena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:5.20: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti maññamāno.
mn29:5.21: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:5.22: ‘na vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso aññāsi sāraṁ na aññāsi phegguṁ na aññāsi tacaṁ na aññāsi papaṭikaṁ na aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:5.23: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva sāraṁ phegguṁ chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti maññamāno.
mn29:5.24: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ nānubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:5.25: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:5.26: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:5.27: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:5.28: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:5.29: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.30: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.31: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.32: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.33: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.34: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.35: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.36: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:5.37: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:5.38: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:5.39: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:5.40: ‘ahamasmi jānaṁ passaṁ viharāmi, ime panaññe bhikkhū ajānaṁ apassaṁ viharantī’ti.
mn29:5.41: So tena ñāṇadassanena majjati pamajjati pamādaṁ āpajjati, pamatto samāno dukkhaṁ viharati.
mn29:5.42: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu phegguṁ aggahesi brahmacariyassa;
mn29:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:6.2: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:6.3: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:6.4: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:6.5: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.6: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.7: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.8: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.9: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.10: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.11: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.12: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.13: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.14: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.15: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.16: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.17: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:6.18: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkameyya ‘sāran’ti jānamāno.
mn29:6.19: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
mn29:6.20: ‘aññāsi vatāyaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāraṁ, aññāsi phegguṁ, aññāsi tacaṁ, aññāsi papaṭikaṁ, aññāsi sākhāpalāsaṁ.
mn29:6.21: Tathā hayaṁ bhavaṁ puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato sāraññeva chetvā ādāya pakkanto “sāran”ti jānamāno.
mn29:6.22: Yañcassa sārena sārakaraṇīyaṁ tañcassa atthaṁ anubhavissatī’ti.
mn29:6.23: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn29:6.24: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto,
mn29:6.25: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn29:6.26: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti.
mn29:6.27: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.28: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.29: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.30: So tāya sīlasampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.31: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.32: So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.33: So tāya samādhisampadāya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.34: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.35: So tāya samādhisampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.36: So tena ñāṇadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripuṇṇasaṅkappo.
mn29:6.37: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.38: So tena ñāṇadassanena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṁ āpajjati, appamatto samāno asamayavimokkhaṁ ārādheti.
mn29:6.39: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu tāya asamayavimuttiyā parihāyetha.
mn29:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, nayidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsaṁ, na sīlasampadānisaṁsaṁ, na samādhisampadānisaṁsaṁ, na ñāṇadassanānisaṁsaṁ.
mn29:7.2: Yā ca kho ayaṁ, bhikkhave, akuppā cetovimutti—
mn29:7.3: etadatthamidaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ, etaṁ sāraṁ etaṁ pariyosānan”ti.
mn29:7.5: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
